name: Zombie Survival (ElforTheLandStander) (ElforTheLandStander)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD -> move direction 

WASD + SPACE -> shooting / shot direction 

------------------------------------------------------------

Survive waves of zombies with the help of the CDC special forces team. 

*CALL OF DUTY INSPIRED HEALTH SYSTEM

Power Ups:

HP+ (increases health ) COSTS 5,000 Points

ATT+  (increases max attack) COSTS 5,000 Points
